original_title: Das Flimmern - die Himmelshöhe - die Erde - und ich
overview: A short film about a young man who very much wants a romantic partner, and goes out looking for an outlet for his erotic desires. But it turns out that the space itself, rather than the man, becomes the main character of the film. The memories of the anonymous man literally penetrate this space.
title: Das Flimmern - die Himmelshöhe - die Erde - und ich
